document_data.caption: A map showing Fine Nuts on Spices Street.
document_data.name: Fine Nuts
document_data.mainbody: '''Fine Nuts''', which was also called '''Khostal Hannass Fine Nuts''', was a shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The building was a single story tall.
document_data.Location: Fine Nuts was located in the southeast section of the [[Waterdeep/Dock Ward|Dock Ward]] on [[Spices Street]] just to the west of where it was intersected by [[Wharf Street]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5303}}
document_data.Activities: The shop specialized in the sale of nuts from all over [[Toril]].
document_data.Inhabitants: Fine Nuts was owned by [[Khostal Hannass]] in the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.
